sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Property of Unincorporated Associations Act.

sections.heading: Procedure to
sections.text: effect acts of ownership over real estate.

sections.heading: Power to sue and defend.
sections.text:
Such lodge or subordinate body in and under its own name and number
has the power to sue and be sued, complain and defend in all actions
concerning its real estate.
